name: The Box Brigade
description:
Through sleet and snow...Despite raining and complaining...

Paw Haul will help you move with its formidable and lightning-quick method of handling your goods! Just blindly toss the boxes out the window and our capable team will do the rest. Not only that, but it's completely free! These cats just love moving!

Disclaimer: Paw Haul is not responsible for damage to your possessions by solid impact or fiery explosion. You get what you pay for, pal.

Extra tips for playing:

  • When you have a moment, spread your idle cats across the area where boxes fall. This will save time later.
  • You can click cats that aren't holding heavy boxes to give them a speed boost!
  • F4 will allow you to play in full screen.
  • You can also right click to make a cat throw their carried object away.

Game dedicated to some friends that helped me move. Comment and rate it if you have a moment. Did you read down this far even? I probably wouldn't have.

Graphics, game design and music done by me!

Title font (Tightbox) originally by Xerographer Fonts, found on dafonts.com. I edited it slightly by drawing cat ears and whiskers on it.
